caption.p:
Predicted viral dynamics under treatment. (A) The efficacy of antiviral drug is assumed to be
ε = 0 . 6
and (B)
ε = 0 . 9
. We performed simulation using the fit to the LRT viral load data of patient #2 in [14], [54] as an example. The treatment is assumed to be administrated on day 10, 15 and 20, respectively; (C) For comparison with (A) and (B), the value of
ω
is increased by 5 folds to represent IFN intensification. The antiviral drug efficacy is the same as that in (A), i.e.
ε = 0 . 6
; (D) Predicted dynamics under anti-inflammation therapy. The value of
λ
is fixed to be 10 4, 10 3, 10 2 and 10 cells ml −1 day −1, respectively.
